divs: sighting detailshello. my name is cristian lopez. i just wanted to share an observation that i made while reading information about ufos. i was reading the list provided in wikipedia.org at http:\\en.wikipedia.org\wiki\list_of_major_ufo_sightings and i noticed that pretty much all of the events that include a date all seem to have occurred during the months of february\march (and dates close to these months) for one season and september\november (and dates close to these months) for another season. i write you because you must know a lot more about each of the ufo events and maybe you will be able to better determine if in reality these dates are sigficant. if it were found to be so then we would definately have more good information regarding ufos. anyway, thats my observation. i would appreciate any interesting information you come up with if this observation is valid. thank you. cristian lopez
Summary: Not a UFO report but possible important observation
